ja405:2.1: Appañhi etaṃ → appañca hetaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); appaṃsi etaṃ (mr)
ja405:2.3: sahassāni → sahassānaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1 ^sn6.4#1 [4. Bakabrahmasutta]); sahassāna (sya1ed, sya2ed, km)
ja405:7.2: Sambuddhimantaṃ → sambuddhivantaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); sambuddhavantaṃ (mr) | vatinaṃ → vati taṃ (sya1ed); vatitaṃ (sya2ed); vatidaṃ (mr)
